task.summary: All existing functional tests pass, but a couple more needed. All unit tests green. Closes #245, #253
Locale switching tests added, for NavTree and NavMenu. Difference is sort order noted, see #257

Added async=true to GuiceFilter in web.xml
See this message in Tomcat log:
WARNING: ================================================================= Vaadin depends on Atmosphere 2.1.2.vaadin3 but version 2.1.6 was found. This might cause compatibility problems if push is used. =================================================================
App loads ok, but takes a full minute or more to respond to a page change - once it gets there, it seems fine, and push works
Preparing to swicth to gradle wrapper

MESSAGE.value: All existing functional tests pass, but a couple more needed. All unit tests green. Closes #245, #253
Locale switching tests added, for NavTree and NavMenu. Difference is sort order noted, see #257

Added async=true to GuiceFilter in web.xml
See this message in Tomcat log:
WARNING: ================================================================= Vaadin depends on Atmosphere 2.1.2.vaadin3 but version 2.1.6 was found. This might cause compatibility problems if push is used. =================================================================
App loads ok, but takes a full minute or more to respond to a page change - once it gets there, it seems fine, and push works
Preparing to swicth to gradle wrapper

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Preparing to swicth to gradle wrapper
